EmailTemplate.name: AGREEMENT HANDOVER
EmailTemplate.subject: Agreement Handover Acknowledgment.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Account},
Greetings from Solitaire!
We confirm that the registered agreement of your unit no-{!Opportunity.Project_Unit__c} has been handed over to you today. Kindly confirm the receipt.
Please feel free to contact us for any queries.
Regards, Team CRM Solitaire
